name: Rose Garden Arcade
description:
Submission to Spring 2D Jam 2022. Theme "Garden"

Help the bees save the rose garden. The roses slowly fall and the bee can save them by dropping a flower on them after which the roses grow. If the flower is dropped on a rose of the same color as the rose it grows to full size. The closer the rose is to the ground the more points are gained when a flower is dropped on it.

A and D to move the bee. Left mouse button to release the flower.

The game has been tested on Firefox, Chrome and Brave browsers and these are known issues.

Firefox -  music won`t loop

Chrome - problems with memorising high score

Brave - fonts are not displayed corectly

Music SketchyLogic

Flowers pixels sicklyseraph

Background image Beovuliin
